segments.text: Excuse me , Ma ' am . I would like to mail this package door to door via airmail to London . It is a very important package and has to be sent within 3 days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . But , the postage is much higher than the regular package .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine with me . I am willing to pay for it as long as you can guarantee me the package can arrive in time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . All the registered airmail packages can be received in 5 working days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . How much do I need to pay in total for this package ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I have the receipt ? Just in case I can trace it if something goes wrong .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ! Please just fill in your I . D . number and ways to contact you here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I need to include my zip code in the address ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You had better include that because it is easier for the mailmen to find the correct mailing address .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . Here is 500 dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is your receipt . Contact us if your friend still doesn't receive the package after 5 work days .
segments.speaker: S2
